attributes.action: Day of remembrance off all that died of covid 19
attributes.additional_details: So many people  off the world has lost loved ones that they couldn't  be with .hold there hands see them  for the last time .say there good byes. say they loved them .just be nice that the UK and the world had a day that we could all come together  .to remember  our loved ones
attributes.background: Once we have gone back to some sort  of  normal  life .it would be nice to have a day we can remember  all our loved ones. that so many people  have lost in the pandimic  of covid 19

rejection.details:
You might like to sign the following petition:

A national holiday and day of remembrance for those lost in the COVID pandemic
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/568631
